int.name: DDN_bottom
int.description: Disconnected double null with inner X-point below the midplane

int.name: DDN_top
int.description: Disconnected double null with inner X-point above the midplane

int.name: annulus
int.description: Annular geometry (not necessarily with straight axis)

int.name: structured_spaces
int.description: Structured grid represented with multiple spaces of dimension 1

int.name: LFS_snowflake_minus
int.description: Snowflake grid with secondary x point on the low field side, and the secondary separatrix on top of the primary

int.name: LFS_snowflake_plus
int.description: Snowflake grid with secondary x point to the right of the primary, and the secondary separatrix below the primary

int.name: reference
int.description: Refers to a GGD described in another IDS indicated by grid_path. In such a case, do not fill the grid_ggd node of this IDS
